channel.title: [317 PI] Invisible weapons on swinging animation
channel.description:
My weapons appear correctly when i'm not fighting, but when i swing a scimitar or shoot bows they disappear during the animation.
My teamviewer if you wanna help a poor soul out ^.^
ID: 552 718 732 PW: 8489 [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OoSG_eXYmxI[/youtube]
